00047 DECLARE_CLASS(FieldWarning)
00048 {
00049 public:
00051     FieldWarning(const FieldWarning & x)
00052     {
00053         setNative(x.getNative());
00054     }
00055 
00057     FieldWarning & operator=(const FieldWarning & x)
00058     {
00059         if (&x != this)
00060             setNative(x.getNative());
00061         return *this;
00062     }
00063 
00065     FieldWarning(nitf_FieldWarning * x)
00066     {
00067         setNative(x);
00068         getNativeOrThrow();
00069     }
00070 
00078     FieldWarning(nitf::Off fileOffset, const std::string& fieldName,
00079         nitf::Field & field, const std::string& expectation)
00080             throw(nitf::NITFException)
00081     {
00082         setNative(nitf_FieldWarning_construct(fileOffset, fieldName.c_str(),
00083             field.getNative(), expectation.c_str(), &error));
00084         getNativeOrThrow();
00085         setManaged(false);
00086     }
00087 
00088     ~FieldWarning(){}
00089 
00091     nitf::Off getFileOffset() const
00092     {
00093         return getNativeOrThrow()->fileOffset;
00094     }
00096     std::string getFieldName() const
00097     {
00098         return std::string(getNativeOrThrow()->fieldName);
00099     }
00101     nitf::Field getField()
00102     {
00103         return nitf::Field(getNativeOrThrow()->field);
00104     }
00106     std::string getExpectation() const
00107     {
00108         return std::string(getNativeOrThrow()->expectation);
00109     }
00110 
00111 private:
00112     nitf_Error error;
00113 };
